page.title: 12EVENTS IN SOUTH SHIELDS
page.content:
Every June the annual{South Tyneside {Sports Week}takes place. It begins with a parade of carnival floats, starting at the Town HAll and finishing at the Bents Park on the sea front. The best dressed float gets a prize. Miss South Tyneside rides on a float wearing her bathing costume and crown.
In the week following various sporting events take place in the borough.
An{Annual Flower Show}is held at the Bents Park during Auguat. Craft work and a children's art exhibition are on show as well as flowers and vegetables.
